mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id,user_pass,user_birth, user_gender, user_phone, user_email) values( #{user_id}, #{user_pass}, #{user_birth} ,#{user_gender},#{user_phone},#{user_email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_info where user_id=#{user_id}
select count(*) from user_info where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pass=#{user_pass}
select user_id from user_info where user_email = #{user_email} and user_phone = #{user_phone}
select user_id, user_email from user_info where user_id = #{user_id} and user_email = #{user_email}
mapper.update: update user_info set user_pass = #{user_pass} where user_id = #{user_id}
